source_text: 私立征岭学园。
target_text: Private Seirei Academy.

source_text: 从以前到现在，陆续有许多毕业生活跃于政经界，以学生优秀程度堪称日本顶尖为豪，从国中、高中到大学都采取直升制度的一贯制学校。该校历史悠久，昔日新旧贵族的子弟也大多就读于此，是沿袭优良传统的名校。
target_text: From the past until now, many alumni have been active in politics and business, proudly boasting one

source_text: 学生们走在林荫步道，前往这所传统学舍。
target_text: Students stroll along the tree-lined paths toward this traditional school building.

source_text: 他们和朋友或同学热络聊天走向校舍，不过在一名女学生穿过校门现身的下一剎那，现场的气氛改变了。
target_text: They chat animatedly with friends or classmates as they head to class, but the atmosphere changes th

source_text: 看见她的人们一齐展露惊讶与感叹之意，目光追著她的身影而去。
target_text: Those who see her simultaneously express surprise and admiration, their gazes following her every mo

source_text: 「唔哇，那个女生是谁？超漂亮的！」
target_text: "Whoa, who's that girl? She's stunning!"

source_text: 「你不知道吗？之前的入学典礼，她不就代表新生致词吗？是那位玛利亚同学的妹妹。」
target_text: "You don't know? Didn't she give the speech at the entrance ceremony last year? She's Maria's younge

source_text: 「那时候只有远远看著她……哇，我的天。近看简直像是精灵。」
target_text: "I only saw her from afar back then... Wow, my goodness. Up close, she looks like an elf."

source_text: 「一点都没错。我和她同性又大她一届，却也有点被她的美貌折服。」
target_text: "You're so right. I'm the same gender as her and a year older, yet even I'm captivated by her beauty

source_text: 土生土长的日本人不可能拥有这种白皙到像是透光的肌肤，眼角细长的蓝色双眼散发蓝宝石般的光辉。
target_text: A native Japanese person couldn't possibly have skin so pale it seems translucent, nor eyes so finel

source_text: 还有反射朝阳闪闪发亮，绑成公主头的银色长发。
target_text: And then there's her silver hair, styled in a princess braid, shimmering brilliantly in the morning

source_text: 从她遗传自俄罗斯父亲的深邃五官，隐约感觉得到日本母亲所遗传日式娇柔气息的美貌。
target_text: Her deeply set features inherited from her Russian father subtly hint at the delicate Japanese charm

source_text: 无与伦比的容貌，加上以女生标准来说偏高的身高与修长四肢，而且线条玲珑有致，就像是实现世间女性理想的姣好身材。
target_text: An unparalleled appearance, combined with a height above average for girls, slender limbs, and a per

source_text: 由于色彩特别，使得美貌看起来彷佛超脱尘世的她，名为艾莉莎·米哈伊罗夫纳·九条。去年国三的她转学进入这所征岭学园之后，每次考试都是全年级第一，而且运动万能，还从今年起担任学生会的会计，真的是名副其实被誉
target_text: Her extraordinary beauty, almost otherworldly in its ethereal quality, belongs to Alisa Mikhailovna

source_text: 「喂，你看那里。」
target_text: "Hey, look over there."

source_text: 「咦？唔喔！是九条同学耶！一大早运气就这么好！」
target_text: "Huh? Whoa! It's Kujo-san! Lucky me to see her first thing in the morning!"

source_text: 「我说啊，你去向她打个招呼吧。」
target_text: "Hey, why don't you go say hello?"

source_text: 「不可能不可能！我哪敢啊！」
target_text: "No way, no way! How could I?"

source_text: 「喂喂喂，这不像是平常看见美少女都会搭讪的你喔，只是去打个招呼，难道你怕了？」
target_text: "Come on, this isn't like you, always hitting on beautiful girls. It's just a greeting—what, are you

source_text: 「笨蛋！她的水准……应该说次元不一样！既然这么说，那你自己去啊！」
target_text: "You idiot! Her level... I mean, it's on another dimension! If that's how you feel, then you go!"

source_text: 「我才不要。我可不想出糗被别的男生盯上。」
target_text: "No way. I don't want to embarrass myself and get stared at by other guys."

source_text: 不分男女，周围都向她投以羡慕的眼神。众人自然放慢脚步往两侧回避，她若无其事从容前进。
target_text: Both boys and girls around her cast envious glances. Naturally, everyone slows down and steps aside,

source_text: 此时，一名男学生走向她。周围的学生们一看见这个人就议论纷纷。
target_text: At that moment, a male student approaches her. As soon as the surrounding students spot him, murmurs

source_text: 「嗨，早安。真是清爽的早晨啊。」
target_text: "Hi, good morning. What a refreshing morning, isn't it?"

source_text: 男学生说完露出爽朗笑容，艾莉莎没停下脚步朝他一瞥，从领带颜色确认是学长之后稍微点头致意。
target_text: The male student says this with a bright smile, and Alisa, without stopping, glances at him briefly,

source_text: 「学长早安。」
target_text: "Good morning, senpai."

source_text: 「嗯，早安。算是初次见面吧？我是二年级的安藤，你姊姊的同班同学。」
target_text: "Yeah, good morning. Nice to meet you—I'm Ando, a second-year, and I'm in the same class as your sis

source_text: 「这样啊。」
target_text: "I see."

source_text: 自称安藤的男学生头发染成褐色，制服穿得不太整齐，从衣领看得见银色饰品，感觉算是现代风格的时尚潮男而且相当英俊，但是艾莉莎反应冷漠。
target_text: The male student who introduced himself as Ando has brown-dyed hair, his uniform slightly disheveled

source_text: 男学生的迷人笑容令周围女生娇羞尖叫，艾莉莎则是面不改色平淡应对。
target_text: While the male student's charming smile makes the girls around him squeal with delight, Alisa remain

source_text: 「我经常听你姊姊提到你的事……早就想见你一面了。如何？方便的话午休时间一起吃个饭吧？」
target_text: "I've often heard your sister talk about you... I've been wanting to meet you for a while now. How a

source_text: 「不，免了。」
target_text: "No, thanks."

source_text: 她丝毫不显犹豫就立刻回答。面对如此冷漠的回应，安藤也稍微露出苦笑。
target_text: She answers immediately, without the slightest hesitation. Faced with such a cool response, Ando can

source_text: 「哈哈……真冷淡耶。既然这样，至少交换连络方式好吗？我想更认识你。」
target_text: "Haha... So cold. Well then, at least let's exchange contact info? I'd like to get to know you bette

source_text: 「不好意思，我对你没有兴趣。如果找我只是为了这件事，那我要告辞了。啊，还有──」
target_text: "I'm sorry, but I'm not interested in you. If you're only looking for that, then I'll be taking my l

source_text: 此时艾莉莎视线朝向安藤，伸手指向他的脖子。面对斜看过来的冷漠双眼与比向自己的细长手指，安藤不禁收起笑容，睁大眼睛稍微往后仰。
target_text: At this point, Alisa shifts her gaze toward Ando, pointing a finger at his neck. Facing her cold, pi

source_text: 「……那个，违反校规了。」
target_text: "...That's against the school rules."

source_text: 艾莉莎无视于安藤的慌张，指著他脖子的银色饰品冰冷出言警告，然后只说声「失陪了」就快步离开。这幅光景使得周围屏息旁观至今的学生们再度议论纷纷。
target_text: Ignoring Ando's fluster, Alisa coldly warns him about the silver accessory around his neck, then sim

source_text: 「好厉害，二年级最受女生欢迎的那位安藤学长都被一口回绝了。感觉真的像是孤傲的公主大人耶。」
target_text: "Wow, even Ando-senpai, the most popular guy among the girls in second year, got rejected outright.

source_text: 「她的理想标准到底多高啊……有男生配得上她吗？」
target_text: "Just how high are her standards... Is there any guy who could ever measure up?"

source_text: 「说起来她根本对男生没兴趣吧？明明那么漂亮，太可惜了。」
target_text: "Come to think of it, she's probably not interested in guys at all. Such a waste, being so beautiful

source_text: 「不对不对，她不属于任何人，我们反倒可以放心吧？」
target_text: "No, no, she doesn't belong to anyone, which actually puts our minds at ease, doesn't it?"

source_text: 「是啊。从偶像的意义来说，她比一般的偶像还要偶像得多。要我一辈子看她都没问题，甚至可以膜拜她。」
target_text: "That's right. In terms of being an idol, she's more of an idol than any regular idol. I'd be fine w
